author: manfo2021
title: Djangui: Local Savings Account Mgmt
description: Collector agents organize informal daily savings for local merchants but offer no transparency on fund management exposing users to fraud.
solution: Create a decentralized platform to manage collection activities focusing on: transparency and ownership rights of collected funds.
experience: We have two daily collector veterans working with Wada's team of software developers and architects to create this solution on Cardano.
